snippet: Bracing for what could be the second transit strike in a month, San Francisco officials said that on Monday more ferries and buses would be deployed.
abstract: San Francisco officials, bracing for what could be the second transit strike in a month, say more ferries and buses will be deployed to get commuters across San Francisco Bay.
lead_paragraph: Bracing for what could be the second transit strike in a month, San Francisco officials said that on Monday more ferries and buses would be deployed.

headline.main: California: Second Bay Area Transit Strike Is Looming
headline.print_headline: California: Second Bay Area Transit Strike Is Looming
